body:
Yea the girls in this show where super cute and alot of the older girls where super hot. To bad the show was ruined with some of the worst plotpoints.

Like I remember the worst one was when the girl in the comic was abducted by pirates in this postapocoliptic world where people steal and kill, he flys over in his robot and before they can rape her (yes they actually planed on raping her) he kills all the priates and saves her. Then everyone proceeds to hate him for killing the pirates and saving a person before theh were raped by a bunch of murdering pirates and the heroine slaps him and tells him never to kill again..... stipid show.
